feed.title: GitHub Nix Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of Nix in GitHub

entry.title: chaotic-cx/nyx
entry.summary: Nix flake for "too much bleeding-edge" and unreleased packages (e.g., mesa_git, linux_cachyos, firefox_nightly, sway_git, gamescope_git). And experimental modules (e.g., HDR, duckdns).

entry.title: tpwrules/nixos-apple-silicon
entry.summary: Resources to install NixOS bare metal on Apple Silicon Macs
